overview: Richard has over fifteen years of experience in senior roles for operations, internet applications, e-commerce, SaaS, learning management systems, and multi-channel merchandising. He has been responsible for managing $130 million in annual revenue through on-line and off-line programs most notably with Dell, 3M Company and start-ups. He has proven abilities to evaluate, establish, manage and optimize back office and customer facing programs using extensive experience aligning customer pain points with relevant online and offline applications. In addition, he has Six Sigma Black Belt and consulting experience and three years of small business start-up experience along with an M.B.A. degree from Texas A&M University’s Mays Business School.
